s.text: Last week, George W. Bush initiated a practice that will surely become the norm: declaring contributions immediately online , instead of waiting for quarterly FEC deadlines.
By using the Web in this way, a campaign can convert mass support into grass roots support.
Web advertising is smart, in the sense that it can be far more detailed and specific and because it can reach a target with surgical precision.
